Nu Runtime Documentation

ADP Fields

The fields of the ADP class are listed below. For a complete list of ADP class members, see the ADP Members topic.

Protected Instance Fields

_InvokeInstructions Holds the variable instructions to invoke advice with appropriate argument.
m_target Holds the target object itself on which method is being invoked.
method_info Holds the info to the method.
method_name Name of the method that is to be invoked when a delegate is invoked.
mtypes Holds the types of arguments
number_of_args Holds the number of argument to the method.
prev Reference to the delegate down the invocation chain.
target_type Holds the type of the object on which method is to be invoked.

See Also
